test_message: Mode: valentine. Analyze this chat conversation: Person A: 'Hey! How was your day?' Person B: 'It was great, but it got even better now that you texted me :)' Person A: 'Aww you always know what to say! Want to grab dinner tomorrow?' Person B: 'I would love that! I was actually about to ask you the same thing' Person A: 'Great minds think alike! I found this cute Italian place' Person B: 'You know I love Italian! You remember everything about me' Person A: 'Of course I do, you're important to me'
expected_purpose: Analyze chat conversations for relationship insights

actual_response.summary: This conversation overflows with warmth, attentiveness, and mutual enthusiasm. Both parties demonstrate genuine interest, playful rapport, and thoughtful effort—a blend that bodes well for deeper connection.

findings.title: Reciprocal Enthusiasm
findings.description: Both Person A and Person B display equal excitement to engage, propose plans, and compliment one another’s efforts, fostering a sense of mutual investment.
findings.evidence: 'I would love that! I was actually about to ask you the same thing'

findings.title: Thoughtful Personalization
findings.description: Person A shows attentive care by suggesting an Italian place, reflecting knowledge of Person B’s preferences, which strengthens intimacy.
findings.evidence: 'I found this cute Italian place' 'You know I love Italian! You remember everything about me'

findings.title: Affirmation and Emotional Availability
findings.description: Kind words and appreciation are exchanged, such as expressing how important Person B is and how the day improved from the message, highlighting emotional presence.
findings.evidence: 'It was great, but it got even better now that you texted me :)' and 'Of course I do, you're important to me'

findings.title: Playful Rapport
findings.description: Light teasing and mirroring (e.g., 'Great minds think alike!') create an effortless chemistry, pointing to compatibility and shared humor.

actual_response.verdict: Sweet conversation energy—the affection here could light up an entire Italian restaurant.
recommendations: Keep up the thoughtful gestures and attentive listening.
Continue creating opportunities for shared experiences and inside jokes.
Express genuine appreciation for each other—it's clearly working!
actual_response.receipts: This convo radiates chemistry—attentive, playful, and warm. Both people show real care, excitement, and mutual investment. Italian dinner date upgrades ahead!
